subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: There was no better position from which to appreciate the wonder that was Rickey Henderson than the No. 2 hole in the batting order, which Willie Randolph occupied with the Yankees in the 1980s.
snippet: There was no better position from which to appreciate the wonder that was Rickey Henderson than the No. 2 hole in the batting order, which Willie Randolph occupied with the Yankees in the 1980s.
